meanings.definition: A photograph taken by the daguerreotype process.
meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful daguerreotypies of my grandparents on their wedding day.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many old daguerreotypies capturing historical moments.
meanings.sent3: The daguerreotypies in the exhibit seemed to come alive, telling stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the daguerreotypies shone brighter than the sun in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The daguerreotypies revealed a world long forgotten, frozen in time.

meanings.definition: The art or process of producing daguerreotypes.
meanings.sent1: Learning about daguerreotypies helped me appreciate the history of photography.
meanings.sent2: The intricate daguerreotypies process requires great skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The artist's passion for daguerreotypies was evident in every detailed image.
meanings.sent4: Creating daguerreotypies is like capturing a moment and turning it into art.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on daguerreotypies inspired me to try my hand at this unique craft.
